resources.string:
You have selected to create a full batch of Bovine minerals The following ingredients will be used and has been deducted from your inventory list: SO-H20: 200L NaCl: 20KG PTLA: 100KG Selesium salt: 3KG Magnesium salt: 7KG Zink salt: 25KG Copper salt: 6KG Chromium salt: 7KG
for a total 300L.

You have selected to create half a batch of Bovine minerals The following ingredients will be used and has been deducted from your inventory list: SO-H20: 100L NaCl: 10KG PTLA: 50KG Selesium salt: 1.5KG Magnesium salt: 3.5KG Zink salt: 12.5KG Copper salt: 3KG Chromium salt: 3.5KG
for a total 150L.
Please select the volume t hat needs to be made.
